title: IT'S NOT THE DESTINATION, IT'S THE JOURNEY
itunes:title: IT'S NOT THE DESTINATION, IT'S THE JOURNEY
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
Those times when you get up early and you work hard. Those times when you don't feel like working, but you do it anyway. That is actually the dream. It's Not The Destination, It's The Journey. One of the Best Motivational Speeches Ever by Kobe Bryant.


Special thanks to Patrick-Bet David from Valuetainment.


Speaker:


Kobe Bryant (1978-2020)


Music:


Audiomachine


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
